title: Blackstone Earnings Nearly Double as Firm Enjoys Record Cash Haul
sub_head: Private-equity firm’s real-estate business helps power $1.40 billion profit
body:
Blackstone Inc.’s net income nearly doubled in the fourth quarter thanks to strong investment performance in some of its biggest businesses, as the largest private-equity firm by assets raked in more cash than in any other period in its history.
The New York firm said earnings rose to $1.40 billion, or $1.92 a share, from $748.9 million, or $1.07 a share, a year earlier.
